name: Breath of the Gods
description:
PRESENTATION


Breath of the Gods is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of Valiant and Midnight's Blessing.

FEATURES


  • Classic Storyline
  • High Fantasy Setting
  • Beautiful and varied locations to explore
  • Open world experience
  • Sidequests to complete
  • Quest Journal to help keeping track of your progress
  • Mouse Support

SUMMARY


The Gods and the Fallen Gods are waging a war for the fate of the humankind. Dissatisfied with the behavior and consequent outcomes of humans, the Fallen Gods wish to extinguish the race, to create a new one, a better one.
Knowing the true potential of humanity, the True Gods are fighting to preserve humankind. The War will be settled by two Chosen Ones, both sons of Gods, brothers in blood, enemies in the battlefield.
